headline: Product Associate @ AltaML | Bridging AI Innovation and Market Needs
summary:
(1) I am a Product Associate at AltaML, a leading Canadian AI company that creates innovative and impactful AI solutions for various industries. I collaborate with engineers, data scientists, and product managers to enhance product development processes, from investigation to experimentation. I also evaluate the potential of new ventures by analyzing opportunity size, risks, and costs, and conduct market research and experiments to test product viability. 

(2) I have a strong background and passion for machine learning and generative AI, which are the focus of my master's degree in Software Engineering at the University of Calgary and my work at AltaML. I have demonstrated my expertise in this domain by winning first place in an internal hackathon, where I created an app that uses computer vision and large language models to inform end-users how to properly dispose of an item by using a photo. I am eager to learn from and collaborate with other experts and professionals in the field and to apply my knowledge and skills to new and exciting challenges.

experiences.title: Product Discovery Associate
experiences.description:
- Actively participating in different stages of product development from investigation to experimentation.
Collaborating with the development team as a product manager, focusing on creating high-value prototypes.
- Applying my machine learning knowledge to enhance product development processes.
- Evaluating the potential of new ventures by analyzing opportunity size, risks, and costs.
- Conducting discovery interviews and extensive background research to understand market needs.
- Performing business analysis and designing experiments to test product viability.

experiences.title: Consultant
experiences.description:
Wearer of multiple hats; from marketing, to identifying supply chain gaps, sales and client relations. 
- Identifies potential bridges between domestic technologies and foreign markets' operations, mainly in MENA region, creating new ventures. 
- Communicates products and services of clients to potential customers. 
- Hosts private virtual information sessions to potential customers for clients showcasing products and services. 
- Reviews, and assists in creation of documents pertaining to international trade such as: Letter Of Intent, Memorandum of Understanding, Sales Purchase Agreement, Non-Disclosure Agreements, Requests for Proposal and Proposals.

experiences.title: Electrical Design Engineer Intern
experiences.description:
Intern Electrical Project Manager in commercial construction industry. 

Responsibilites include: 

- Designing lighting systems, power and distribution, and communication systems for commercial high-rise and low-rise buildings. 
- Preparing permit, tender and construction drawings. 
- Conducting site surveys for design development.
- Issuing change notices, site instructions and addenda as part of contract administration.
- Attending site walk-throughs and meetings with architects, clients, consultants from other disciplines and contractors for coordination. 
- Utilizing software such as AGI and ETAP for studies to gather engineering data.

experiences.title: Freelance Graphic Designer
experiences.description: I work closely with my clients keeping strong communication to ensure they get the best service. I mainly create logos, promotional posters, and business cards but I have the occasional miscellaneous request.

experiences.title: Hardware Development Team Leader
experiences.description:
-	Student club dedicated to creating, working, and maintaining a drone with LIDAR (Light Detection and Ranging) and Photogrammetry (3D scanning and modelling) capabilities in order to map 3D models of various contours (fields, vehicles, buildings, etc.). 

-	Currently working tightly with the software development team towards perfecting a photo capturing system for demonstration purposes aimed towards attaining a sponsorship.

education.school: Haute école d'ingénierie et d'architecture de Fribourg

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: AltaML AI Hackathon
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Participated in an internal hackathon themed around "Sustainability using AI". Won first place by creating an app that utilizes computer vision and large language models to inform end-users how to properly dispose of an item by using a photo.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Hack The Change Nationwide Hackathon
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
Won Admin's Choice Award for creating a web application where tutors, which can be other students, can teach students in an online tutor room according to language preferences and selected subjects. 

Hackathon was themed around UN's sustainability goals, and ours focused on making education more accessible.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Morgan Stanley Nation Wide Hackathon
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Won 2nd Place for developing a web app which connects farmers, food banks, and volunteer gleaners to mitigate food waste.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: ISA 2015 Student Competition Runner-Up
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
-	 2nd place winner in the ISA student competition held in Edmonton representing ZOO ( Department of Electrical, Computer, and Software Engineering) and the University of Calgary. 

-	Competition involved troubleshooting a FESTO bottling station and ensuring it was smooth and operational.

certifications.name: Digital Product Management: Modern Fundamentals
certifications.authority: University of Virginia Darden School of Business
